root.name: Pinball Heroes
root.description: OverviewPinball Heroes is a download-only pinball series, featuring 9 tables based on Sony franchises - Uncharted, Motorstorm, WipEout, Hot Shots Golf, PAIN, High Velocity Bowling, ModNation Racers, and Fat Princess.Initially published for the PSP in 2009, it got an enhanced rerelease for the PS Vita 2013 featuring all the tables in one package with added online and social media functionality.GameplayEach table can be viewed multiple ways: the normal, zoomed in view, the zoomed out "portrait" view, and two other portrait views that fill up the entire PSP screen, forcing the player to turn the console on its side in order to view the playfield properly.
